description: Sunderland sign Sochaux striker Eliezer Mayenda for an undisclosed fee on a five-year deal.
title: Eliezer Mayenda: Sunderland sign Sochaux striker for undisclosed fee
title_page: Eliezer Mayenda: Sunderland sign Sochaux striker for undisclosed fee - BBC Sport
maintext:
Sunderland have signed Sochaux striker Eliezer Mayenda for an undisclosed fee on a five-year deal.
The 18-year-old former Spain Under-17 international became the French side's youngest ever player when he made his debut aged 16 years and seven months in December 2021.
"I am very happy to be here because it is what I wanted. It is a historic club in England," he told the club website., external
"I really wanted to take up the new challenge."
